Jim Kwik is the founder of Kwik Learning and a widely recognized world expert in speed-reading, memory improvement, brain performance, and accelerated learning. After a childhood brain injury left him learning-challenged, Kwik created strategies to dramatically enhance his mental performance. For over two decades, he has served as the go-to brain coach to many of the world's leading CEOs and celebrities. He has dedicated his life to helping others unleash their true genius and brainpower to learn anything faster and live a life of greater power, prosperity, productivity, and peace of mind. Kwik's cutting-edge techniques, entertaining presentation style, and impressive brainpower feats have made him a frequent and highly sought-out trainer for top organizations, with clients that include Google, Virgin, Nike, Zappos, GE, Harvard, NYU, and more. He is regularly featured in media, including Forbes, HuffPost, Fast Company, Inc., and CNBC. He is the host of the acclaimed "Kwik Brain" podcast, which is consistently the #1 training show on iTunes. KwikLearning.com's online courses are used by students in over 180 countries. Connect with Jim Kwik at JimKwik.com.
